about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Spirit Realm Saga, where you can immerse yourself in a plethora of gaming delights, including role-playing, Roguelike adventures, tower defense, strategy, simulation, and puzzle-solving.

Game Features

In the ethereal realm of spirits, you will assume the role of a courageous hero entrusted with the task of rescuing NPCs possessed by malevolent spirits. Recruit them to your cause and unite to confront adversaries on all fronts.


Explore the game world to gather a diverse array of resources, which you can utilize to forge formidable weapons and equipment. Additionally, craft and deploy cunning traps to establish defensive fortifications and repel monstrous assaults.


Unleash the power of the enigmatic Spirit Crystals to transcend into a state of soul separation, embarking on a transcendent journey into the Spirit Realm. Brace yourself for encounters with fiercer demons and daunting challenges that lie ahead.


With wisdom and valor, chart your legendary tale amidst the veiled enigmas and uncertainties of this realm. Forge your own path to glory!
